site.title: MilloColor - Premium Automotive Paint Solutions
site.description: High-quality automotive paint solutions for professionals. Distributor of premium European paints with 30+ years of experience.

hero.title: Coloring the Future
hero.headline: The Future of Automotive Paint
hero.tagline: Experience unmatched quality and brilliance with MilloColor's premium finishes
hero.subtitle: Premium automotive paint solutions for professionals

hero.title: Leading Excellence Since 1993
hero.subtitle: Empowering professionals across Albania with the finest paints, coatings, materials, and equipment
hero.description: Millocolor sh.p.k. is a leading Albanian based company dedicated to providing high-quality products and expert solutions for the automotive refinishing, industrial painting, and furniture finishing sectors. Established in 1993 as an authorized dealer and distributor for some of the world's most reputable brands, we have built a strong reputation for excellence, reliability, and unparalleled customer support.

mission.title: Our Mission
mission.description: To empower professionals across Albania with the finest paints, coatings, materials, and equipment, coupled with the knowledge and support they need to achieve exceptional results in their painting and finishing projects. We are committed to driving innovation and raising industry standards through our comprehensive offerings and specialized services.

whatWeOffer.title: What We Offer
whatWeOffer.description: At Millocolor, we understand the intricate demands of modern finishing work. Our extensive portfolio includes:

premiumPaints.title: Premium Paints & Coatings
premiumPaints.description: We supply a wide array of professional paints and coatings from renowned brands such as Cromax, Standox, Sherwin-Williams, Roberlo S.A., Dichem, EP Vernici, Troton, Duxone, and Hempel.

auxiliaryMaterials.title: Specialized Auxiliary Materials
auxiliaryMaterials.description: Top-grade putties, primers, clearcoats, and consumables that ensure a flawless finish and lasting durability.

equipment.title: Advanced Equipment & Tools
equipment.description: Distributors of cutting-edge equipment from leaders like RUPES, Mirka, SATA, TELWIN, and 3M — providing precision and efficiency.

commitment.title: Our Commitment to Excellence
commitment.description: Beyond products, Millocolor fosters expertise through training and consulting services, including theoretical programs for refinishing technicians. This ensures clients gain both superior products and the skills to maximize their use.

reach.title: Our Reach
reach.description: Strategically located on the Tirana-Durres highway, our operations enable efficient imports and distribution from Belgium, Germany, and Spain — guaranteeing consistent access to the best solutions across Albania.

partnership.title: More Than a Supplier
partnership.description: Millocolor sh.p.k. is more than a supplier; we are a trusted partner, driving growth and success in the Albanian painting and finishing industry.

faq.title: Frequently Asked Questions
faq.subtitle: Get answers to common questions about our services

q1.question: How long does a typical service consultation take?
q1.answer: Most consultations take 2-4 hours depending on the scope. We provide a detailed timeline during our initial assessment.

q2.question: Do you provide services across all of Albania?
q2.answer: Yes, we provide services throughout Albania with our main operations based on the Tirana-Durres highway for efficient coverage.

q3.question: What brands and equipment do you work with?
q3.answer: We work with leading brands including Cromax, Standox, RUPES, Mirka, SATA, TELWIN, 3M, and many others.

q4.question: Do you offer training for new technicians?
q4.answer: Yes, we offer comprehensive training programs for technicians at all skill levels, from beginners to experienced professionals.

q5.question: Can you help optimize our current processes?
q5.answer: Absolutely. Our process audits help identify inefficiencies and provide actionable recommendations for improvement.

q6.question: What kind of after-sales support do you provide?
q6.answer: We provide ongoing technical assistance, troubleshooting, warranty guidance, and regular follow-ups to ensure optimal performance.

contactBanner.title: Need Tailored Guidance?
contactBanner.subtitle: Our experts are ready to help you achieve exceptional results

getInTouch.subtitle: Ready to enhance your painting process? Contact our experts today

hero.title: Get in Touch

faq.title: Frequently Asked Questions
faq.subtitle: Quick answers to common questions about our services

q1.question: How quickly do you respond to inquiries?
q1.answer: We typically respond to all inquiries within 24 hours during business days. For urgent matters, please call us directly.

q2.question: Do you provide services across all of Albania?
q2.answer: Yes, we provide services throughout Albania with our main operations based in Tirana for efficient coverage.

q3.question: What are your business hours?
q3.answer: We're open Monday-Friday 8:00-17:00, Saturday 9:00-14:00, and closed on Sundays.

q4.question: Can I visit your showroom?
q4.answer: Yes, you're welcome to visit our Tirana headquarters. We recommend calling ahead to schedule a visit.

q5.question: Do you offer training programs?
q5.answer: Yes, we offer comprehensive training programs for technicians at all skill levels, from beginners to experienced professionals.

q6.question: What brands do you work with?
q6.answer: We work with leading brands including Cromax, Standox, RUPES, Mirka, SATA, TELWIN, 3M, and many others.

productShowcase.title: Featured Products
productShowcase.subtitle: Discover our premium automotive paint solutions engineered for professional excellence and superior results

premiumCoating.name: RUPES Skorpio III RH356
premiumCoating.description: Professional random orbital pneumatic sander with 150mm pad and 6mm orbit. Features engineered motor for maximum torque, extremely low vibration, and quiet operation.
premiumCoating.features: 6mm orbit for perfect balance|0-11,000 RPM|Anti-slip rubber coating|Double row bearings

professionalSystem.name: Roberlo Professional Spray Gun
professionalSystem.description: High-precision automotive spray gun with advanced atomization technology. Designed for professional refinishing with superior finish quality and material efficiency.
professionalSystem.features: Advanced atomization|High transfer efficiency|Precision control|Professional finish

specialtyEffects.name: SATAjet X 5500
specialtyEffects.description: Revolutionary paint spray gun with X nozzle system. Features whispering nozzle technology, optimized material distribution, and exceptional atomization for all paint systems.
specialtyEffects.features: Revolutionary X nozzle system|Whispering nozzle technology|Material savings|360° perfect finish

ecoSolutions.name: RUPES BigFoot LHR21 Mark V
ecoSolutions.description: Premium random orbital polisher with large diameter movement. Features brushless motor technology, exceptional balance, and professional-grade performance.
ecoSolutions.features: Brushless motor technology|Large orbit movement|Exceptional balance|Professional performance

industrialGrade.name: SATAjet 5000 B
industrialGrade.description: Versatile HVLP/RP spray gun with adjustable inlet pressure and painting distance. Perfect for automotive refinishing with consistent fan size across nozzle spectrum.
industrialGrade.features: HVLP/RP technology|Adjustable pressure|Consistent fan size|Professional results

customFinishes.name: Roberlo Custom Application System
customFinishes.description: Tailored spray application solutions for unique requirements. Features modular design, precision control, and expert consultation for custom applications.

roberlo-kronox-510.name: Roberlo Kronox 510 Clearcoat
roberlo-kronox-510.description: High-solids clearcoat delivering rapid curing, deep gloss, and reliable vertical stability for premium finishes.

roberlo-multyfiller-express.name: Roberlo Multyfiller Express
roberlo-multyfiller-express.description: Versatile 3-in-1 primer-surfacer-filler with express drying for quick sanding cycles.

cromax-vr-1120.name: Cromax VR-1120 Low VOC Clear
cromax-vr-1120.description: Low VOC clearcoat engineered for fast throughput and brilliant gloss retention on refinish jobs.

cromax-710r.name: Cromax 710-R Primer Surfacer
cromax-710r.description: High-build two-pack primer delivering excellent coverage, quick drying, and consistent color holdout.

standox-k9600-xtreme.name: Standox K9600 Xtreme Clear
standox-k9600-xtreme.description: Ultra-fast clearcoat with outstanding flow, deep gloss, and extreme chemical resistance.

standox-k9510-easy.name: Standox K9510 Easy Clear
standox-k9510-easy.description: User-friendly clearcoat with a broad application window and reliable drying on everyday repairs.

duxone-dx48.name: Duxone DX48 HS Primer
duxone-dx48.description: High-solids 2K primer offering strong filling power, adhesion, and fast sanding properties.

duxone-dx64.name: Duxone DX64 HS Clear
duxone-dx64.description: Dependable high-solids clearcoat balancing easy application with durable, high-gloss finishes.

hempel-zinc-17360.name: Hempel Zinc 17360
hempel-zinc-17360.description: Zinc-rich epoxy primer designed for superior corrosion protection in aggressive environments.

hempel-underwater-primer.name: Hempel Underwater Primer
hempel-underwater-primer.description: Two-component epoxy primer providing strong adhesion and waterproofing below the waterline.

fiac-500-industrial-black.name: FIAC 500 Industrial Compressor – Black
fiac-500-industrial-black.description: Heavy-duty 500L piston compressor engineered for continuous air delivery in industrial workshops.

fiac-500-silver.name: FIAC 500 Silver Compressor
fiac-500-silver.description: Powerful workshop compressor delivering stable airflow, efficient cooling, and reliable operation.

epvernici-vrap.name: EP Vernici VRAP Primer
epvernici-vrap.description: High-performance epoxy primer for robust adhesion and corrosion shielding on structural steel.

epvernici-vprl.name: EP Vernici VPRL Topcoat
epvernici-vprl.description: Durable polyurethane topcoat that maintains color and gloss in demanding industrial conditions.

jbm-7-drawer-trolley.name: JBM 7 Drawer Tool Trolley – Green
jbm-7-drawer-trolley.description: Powder-coated workshop trolley with seven ball-bearing drawers and central locking.

jbm-modular-storage.name: JBM Workshop Modular Storage System
jbm-modular-storage.description: Modular workshop furniture solution combining cabinets, pegboards, and worktops for organised spaces.

masterdichem-acrilprimer-gold.name: Master DiChem Acrilprimer 2K 5:1 Gold
masterdichem-acrilprimer-gold.description: Premium acrylic primer offering excellent sealing, fast drying, and smooth sanding in a 5:1 mix.

masterdichem-sigil-metal.name: Master DiChem Sigil Metal
masterdichem-sigil-metal.description: Flexible 1K sealant for metal seams providing strong adhesion and durable protection against moisture.

mirka-deros-680.name: Mirka DEROS 680
mirka-deros-680.description: Compact 150mm electric sander with 5mm orbit delivering low vibration and connected dust extraction.

mirka-abranet.name: Mirka Abranet Abrasive
mirka-abranet.description: Net-backed abrasive discs that stay clog-free and support virtually dust-free sanding.

shw-wood-basecoat.name: Sherwin-Williams Wood Basecoat
shw-wood-basecoat.description: High-build wood basecoat providing smooth coverage and excellent stain blocking for furniture finishing.

shw-wood-topcoat.name: Sherwin-Williams Wood Topcoat
shw-wood-topcoat.description: Protective wood topcoat that enhances warmth, clarity, and scratch resistance on cabinetry.

telwin-smart-inductor-5000.name: Telwin Smart Inductor 5000
telwin-smart-inductor-5000.description: Smart induction heating system for rapid, controlled removal of glued or seized components.

telwin-aqua-inductor-6000.name: Telwin Aqua Inductor 6000
telwin-aqua-inductor-6000.description: Water-cooled induction unit delivering continuous power for structural straightening and repairs.

troton-light-putty.name: Troton Light Putty
troton-light-putty.description: Lightweight polyester putty that spreads easily, cures fast, and sands without clogging.

troton-bold-putty.name: Troton Bold Putty
troton-bold-putty.description: Reinforced body filler providing high mechanical strength and excellent adhesion on large repairs.
